main event: A reliable Navy witness reported sighting a balloon-shaped object at Moody AFB, Alabama, on February 6, 1954.
interesting points: The object was described as silver or orange in color., The sighting lasted for approximately one minute., The object was moving in a military and civilian course direction., The case was investigated and thought to be a weather balloon., Weather conditions at the time included visibility of 10 miles with thin scattered clouds.
